Oklahoma_City.Penn Square Mall: Penn Square Mall is a two-story, 1,063,000-square-foot (98,800 m2) regional shopping mall in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, United States. It is located at the intersection of Pennsylvania Avenue and NW Expressway, near Interstate 44. The mall's anchor stores consist of J. C. Penney, Macy's, and two separate Dillard's stores.
